author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The other week I put out a video called the operating system known as Linux and I didn't mention GNU at all in that video, so here is that video where I talk about GNU to appease all of those people

Linux Video: https://youtu.be/55MwAlcpvK4
